Have done this. I believe the l=
ogic in ExperimentRun::start requires 
that the call to finishEvaluations s=
hould be inside the "for (size_t 
generations=3D(population-getGenerationCo=
unt()-
1);generations<maxGenerations;generations++)" braces. I have tested =

this change and it appears to work correctly. The code implementing 
this =
modification is supplied in the posted zip file to the files 
section of th=
e group yesterday (04/26/07). Any feedback is 
appreciated!

Thanks,
   And=
y Carl
